segments.text: Hi , Helen ! how is it going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm very busy these days . It seems I can never finish my work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , take it easy ! Don't let it get on top of you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll try . I'm under a lot of pressure right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't you take a few days off ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can't . I am really behind of my work .
segments.speaker: S2
